scripts.build: npm run build:data-collector && npm run build:analysis-engine && npm run build:api
scripts.build:data-collector: cd data-collector && esbuild index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=../dist/data-collector/index.js && cd ../dist/data-collector && zip -r ../../data-collector.zip .
scripts.build:analysis-engine: cd analysis-engine && esbuild index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --external:@anthropic-ai/sdk --outfile=../dist/analysis-engine/index.js && cd ../dist/analysis-engine && zip -r ../../analysis-engine.zip .
scripts.build:api: cd api && esbuild index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=../dist/api/index.js && cd ../dist/api && zip -r ../../api.zip .
